entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
